entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: The Department of Mysteries is mentioned as a location, but its exact nature or significance is not described in this text.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and rider of thestral. He is described as gripping the thestral with every last ounce of his strength.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another person who is riding a thestral. He lands a short way away from Harry and topples off his thestral onto the pavement.

relationships.description: Harry rides the thestral, gripping it with every last ounce of his strength.
Ron also rides a thestral and lands a short way away from Harry.
